name: Ergocalciferol

indications.text: ergocalciferol capsules indicated treatment hypoparathyroidism , refractory rickets , also known vitamin resistant rickets , familial hypophosphatemia .

contraindications.text: range therapeutic toxic doses narrow . vitamin resistant rickets : 12,000 500,000 iu units daily . hypoparathyroidism : 50,000 200,000 iu units daily concomitantly calcium lactate 4 g , six times per day . must individualized close medical supervision . calcium intake adequate . blood calcium phosphorus determinations must made every 2 weeks frequently necessary . x-rays bones taken every month condition corrected stabilized .

warningsAndPrecautions: capsules 1.25 mg ( 50,000 iu vitamin ) ergocalciferol , usp clear green oval softgel capsules filled clear pale yellow . ndc 63629-7913-1 : 90 capsules bottle ndc 63629-7913-2 : 40 capsules bottle ndc 63629-7913-3 : 20 capsules bottle store 20° - 25°c ( 68° - 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° - 30°c ( 59° - 86°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature ] protect light moisture . dispense tight , light-resistant container defined usp . repackaged/relabeled : bryant ranch prepack , inc.burbank , ca 91504
adverseReactions: ergocalciferol capsules contraindicated patients hypercalcemia , malabsorption syndrome , abnormal sensitivity toxic effects vitamin , hypervitaminosis .
indications_original: Ergocalciferol Capsules are indicated for use in the treatment of hypoparathyroidism, refractory rickets, also known as vitamin D resistant rickets, and familial hypophosphatemia.
contraindications_original:
THE RANGE BETWEEN THERAPEUTIC AND TOXIC DOSES IS NARROW.
                  
                     Vitamin D Resistant Rickets: 12,000 to 500,000 IU units daily.
                  
                     Hypoparathyroidism: 50,000 to 200,000 IU units daily concomitantly with calcium lactate 4 g, six times per day.
                  DOSAGE MUST BE INDIVIDUALIZED UNDER CLOSE MEDICAL SUPERVISION.
                  Calcium intake should be adequate. Blood calcium and phosphorus determinations must be made every 2 weeks or more frequently if necessary.
                  X-rays of the bones should be taken every month until condition is corrected and stabilized.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Capsules of 1.25 mg (50,000 IU Vitamin D) of ergocalciferol, USP are clear green oval softgel capsules filled with a clear to pale yellow.
                  
                     NDC 63629-7913-1: 90 Capsules in a BOTTLE
                     NDC 63629-7913-2: 40 Capsules in a BOTTLE
                     NDC 63629-7913-3: 20 Capsules in a BOTTLE
                  
                  Store at 20° - 25°C (68° - 77°F); excursions permitted between 15° - 30°C (59° - 86°F). [See USP Controlled Room Temperature]
                  Protect from light and moisture.
                  Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container as defined in the USP.
                  Repackaged/Relabeled by:Bryant Ranch Prepack, Inc.Burbank, CA 91504
adverseReactions_original: Ergocalciferol Capsules are contraindicated in patients with hypercalcemia, malabsorption syndrome, abnormal sensitivity to the toxic effects of vitamin D, and hypervitaminosis D.
